text: Update on a #powercut in #Coventry #CV1 #CV5 and surrounding area, engineers are still working on this and aim to have all properties back on by 21:00.
We are aware of a #powercut in the #Coventry #CV5 and surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 14:30. Andi.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Wolverhampton #WV1 #WV6 #WV10 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
We are aware that properties are without power in #Wolverhampton #WV1 #WV6 #WV10 area. We aim to restore all supplies by 05:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut  Siân
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Newcastle #ST4 #ST5 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.   Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #Newcastle #ST4 & #ST5 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 22:30. Drew
Update #Powercut we've got most supplies back on in the #Worcester #WR9 area but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 15:00. Sorry for the delay. Andi.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in #Worcester #WR9 area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 10:30. Ellie
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Olney #MK46 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Ellie
We are aware that properties are without power in #Olney #MK46 area. We aim to restore all supplies by 10:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut Ellie
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Wellingborough #NN8 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.   Siân
There is currently a #powercut in #NN8 #Wellingborough & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 06:30.  Siân
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Cardiff #CF14 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
Apologies for the #powercut in #Cardiff #CF14 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 00:00. Drew
Good evening. I'll be here @gridcustomersuk throughout the night to help customers in #southWales, the #West and #Midlands affected by a #powercut. Call us on 0800 6783 105 or just 105. David.
Power supplies are restored at #Bristol #BS15 area. We apologise for any disruption caused by the #powercut this evening.
Power supplies are restored at #Falmouth #TR11 and surrounding areas. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut.
We are aware that properties are without power in #Bristol #BS15 & surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 19:00. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
We're aware of a #powercut in #Falmouth #TR11 due to damage at a substation. We're currently trying to restore power by 18:30. Drew

Good evening. I'll be here @gridcustomersuk throughout the night to help customers in #southWales, the #West and #Midlands. To report a #powercut or other electrical emergency call us at any time on 0800 6783 105 or just 105. David.
